content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? May I have your name to get started?
Hi, my name is Linda. I was thinking about getting some plumbing work done.
Thank you, Linda! Could you please provide your address so I can make sure we cover your area and get things started for your plumbing job?
Great, thank you! Can you tell me a little more about the plumbing issue you are experiencing?
It's a leaky faucet in my kitchen, nothing too urgent.
Thank you for letting me know, Linda. What day and time would work best for you to have one of our plumbers come take a look?
Actually, I just checked online and saw someone offering plumbing visits for $40. I think Iâ€™ll go with them instead.
Thank you for letting me know, Linda! If you change your mind or need help in the future, please feel free to reach back out. Have a wonderful day!
reason: Customer found a cheaper competitor and does not wish to schedule.
